findcast

FindCast is intended to be a one-stop-shop for finding local weather reports, location, postal codes, zip codes, information about countries, animals, etc. However, only the weather functionality is available at this time. Others are coming soon!

To search for the weather report of a particular city, enter the name of the city and press search. However, if you want to search based on your geolocation, then press the geolocation button and allow your browser to use your location.
